channel.title: k8s on CloudNativePG - PostgreSQL Operator for Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in k8s on CloudNativePG - PostgreSQL Operator for Kubernetes

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.16.1 and 1.15.3 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released a new update for the supported 1.16.x and 1.15.x versions of the CloudNativePG operator.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.16.0 and 1.15.2 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released the new 1.16 minor version and a new update for the supported 1.15 version of the CloudNativePG operator.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.15.1 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released a new update for the supported 1.15.x version of the CloudNativePG operator.

item.title: Running PostgreSQL the Kubernetes Way
item.description: Welcome CloudNativePG as a new open source operator that orchestrates PostgreSQL clusters inside Kubernetes!
